BiocRevSumm 0.0.4

Package index

All functions

build_vignette_path()
create raw user content path for a vignette
desc
a list of 68 repository descriptions for packages in review in Nov 2025
find_existing_branch()
find branch name for an arbitrarily named submission to Bioconductor
get_issue_repo_urls()
given an issue stream, find the first URL mentioned
get_repo_issues()
given a github repo and token, enumerate all open issues
get_repo_metadata()
produce a list with repository metadata, README, and DESCRIPTION for a given repository
list_github_dir()
use GitHub API to list files in a repo folder
vig2data()
Use the extract_data facility defined in ellmer's doc to obtain summary information about textual content. Originally tailored to vignettes in bioconductor; it is newly generalized to handle any pdf, html or text in URL.
viglist_23_nov_2025
URLs for vignettes of packages in review 22 Nov 2025

Developed by Vince Carey.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
